017package org.apache.commons.chain.web.servlet;
018
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.fail;
020
021import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
022import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
023import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
024import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
025
026import javax.servlet.ServletConfig;
027
028import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
029
030/**
031 *  Test case for {@link ChainProcessor}.
032 */
033public class ChainProcessorTestCase {
034
035    // ------------------------------------------------- Individual Test Methods
036
037    /**
038     * Test serialization.
039     */
040    @Test
041    public void testSerialize() {
042        // Initialize a ChainProcessor
043        ChainProcessor processor = initServlet(new ChainProcessor(), new MockServletConfig("test"));
044
045        // Serialize/Deserialize & test value
046        processor = (ChainProcessor)serializeDeserialize(processor, "First Test");
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Initialize the ChainProcessor.
051     *
052     * @param processor The chain processor instance
053     * @param config The servlet config to initialize with
054     *
055     * @return The chain processor
056     */
057    private ChainProcessor initServlet(ChainProcessor processor, ServletConfig config) {
058        try {
059            processor.init(config);
060        } catch (Throwable t) {
061            t.printStackTrace();
062            fail("ChainProcessor init() threw " + t);
063        }
064        return processor;
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Do serialization and deserialization.
069     */
070    private Object serializeDeserialize(Object target, String text) {
071        // Serialize the test object
072        ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
073        try {
074            ObjectOutputStream oos = new ObjectOutputStream(baos);
075            oos.writeObject(target);
076            oos.flush();
077            oos.close();
078        } catch (Exception e) {
079            fail(text + ": Exception during serialization: " + e);
080        }
081
082        // Deserialize the test object
083        Object result = null;
084        try {
085            ByteArrayInputStream bais =
086                new ByteArrayInputStream(baos.toByteArray());
087            ObjectInputStream ois = new ObjectInputStream(bais);
088            result = ois.readObject();
089            bais.close();
090        } catch (Exception e) {
091            fail(text + ": Exception during deserialization: " + e);
092        }
093
094        return result;
095    }
096}
